thread.title: Riding along with the Golden car cruise
thread.title_full: Riding along with the Golden car cruise

author: Kathleen Lavine
title: Riding along with the Golden car cruise
text:
Riding along with the Golden car cruise Jul 10, 2015, 4:00am MDT A cruiser and its co-navigators enjoy the ride as crowds line the street. The car cruise runs the first Saturday of the month, May through October. Subscribe now to 5 photos A cruiser and its co-navigators enjoy the ride as crowds line the street. Golden gets itâ€™s cruise on the first Saturday of the month, May through October. South Golden Road is lined with spectators as they set up chairs and blankets to watch cars of all makes and models cruise the pavement bounded by two round-abouts at Johnson Road and Ulysses Street. Click on the slideshow to see a gallery of photos from the event.
